name: Allen Johnson
summaryItems: I am a seasoned full stack developer based in Denver, Colorado.
I have strong expertise in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS.
I am experienced across diverse environments such as Next.js, Node.js, PHP, Java, .NET, and Ruby on Rails.
I built this site using Next.js, React, TypeScript, and MongoDB, and I deploy to Vercel.
I enjoy travel, hiking, photography, electronic music, generative AI, and foreign languages.
aboutIntro: I'm Allen Johnson. I live in Denver, Colorado, where I build websites.
aboutItems: I am a seasoned full stack developer with strong expertise in front-end technologies, including JavaScript, React, HTML, and CSS.
I am experienced across diverse environments such as Next.js, Node.js, PHP, Java, .NET, and Ruby on Rails.

I bring a proven track record in performance optimization, e-commerce, and digital strategy, along with a passion for contributing to collaborative teams and delivering impactful, user-centered solutions.
I also enjoy travel, hiking, photography, electronic music, generative AI, and foreign languages.
contactIntro: Please send me a message if you have any questions about my skills and experience, or if you would like to inquire about hiring me for your project or team.
